CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Add to Cart stage positioned above or below the Add to Wishlist stage?
SRP.A: The Add to Cart stage is positioned {below} the Add to Wishlist stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {1147}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Advertisement?
VE.A: The value of stage View Advertisement is {9024}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Visit Product Page?
VE.A: The value of stage Visit Product Page is {5533}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Advertisement, with a value of {9024}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Enter Payment Information, with a value of {1147}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart?
SC.A: Decreased by {1448} Users from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 7278? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1703? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {1365}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {1147}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1256 and 4511? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Wishlist} stage has {3490}, the {Add to Cart} stage has {2042}, the {Initiate Checkout} stage has {1365}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage View Advertisement to Visit Product Page, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Advertisement} to {Visit Product Page} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart, or from stage View Advertisement to Visit Product Page?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Advertisement} to stage {Visit Product Page} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Advertisement} and {Visit Product Page} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initiate Checkout} and {Enter Payment Information} stages.
